title: Sci-Fi World Colony Sound Effects
description: Create the perfect room tone and sound environment for your next sci-fi game, film, and audio productions. Sci-fi World: Colony is an ambience loop library inspired by the human race of award-winning game “Starcraft”.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Video Demos

This loop library includes over 119 location specific ambiance loops and loop-able layers which gives you the ability to accent your ambiances with sounds like air burst, air leak, wind and more.

Sci-fi World Colony includes 1.28 GB of samples to choose from and over 2 hours of loop-able background room tones and ambiances. Each loop is 1 minute in length and includes 1-2 alt versions per main loop. This allows you to orchestrate your game's background sound how you want it. If the full loop has too much going on, then try using the minimal version without the sound you don’t like.

Sci-fi World Colony is rapidly being added into sound designers banks as a reliable source of audio inspiration. You get to invent new worlds with immersive atmospheres and construct your background sound how you want it. Explore the depths of a mine or experience the sound of a sub bay with these scene setting tones.

Sci-fi World Colony is the first installment of the Sci-fi World ambiance loop library series. All of the recordings are royalty free and delivered in 44.1k 16bit .wav files, giving you the best quality for heavy sound editing, pitch shifting, and fx processing while keeping a top notch level of clarity and precision. Need more ambience loops? Be sure to check out Swarms sisters sound libraries - Sci-fi World Swarm and Sci-fi World Guardians.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 119 game ready loop-able assets
  • 1.28 GB of ambience samples
  • All in 44.1k 16bit .wav
  • Includes a 44.1k 16bit .wav version of library
  • Sci-fi Ambience Loop Library
  • Over 2 hours of sound
  • Includes a variety of locations
  • Perfect for games, room tones, and film
  • Includes embed Soundminer metadata
  • 26 ambiences loops like an alien cave, energy lab, hangar, sub bay & more
  • 45 minimal version loops
  • 48 loop-able layer loops like bio lab, air bursts, wind, air leak
  • All royalty free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)

Number of Audio Waves: 119

Number of Audio Cues: 119

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 120 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List
